title: Technology to help deepen our relationship with wild animals
text:
Technology to help deepen our relationship with wild animals Tuesday, February 20, 2018 - 01:45 
The interactive app called 'Safari Central'' allows users to interact with augmented reality versions (AR) of actual animals while educating them on their conservations issues. Elly Park reports.   
The interactive app called 'Safari Central" allows users to interact with augmented reality versions (AR) of actual animals while educating them on their conservations issues. Elly Park reports.  //reut.rs/2sJOyjP
